牋字的基本解释

牋
jiān
同“笺”②牋④。

牋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiān］
［《廣韻》則前切，平先，精。］
(1)表文之一种。魏晋以后多用以上皇后、太子及诸王。
(2)泛指书信。
(3)用于书写的精美纸张。

牋字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【片字部】　牋； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页693第28
〔古文〕椾【廣韻】【正韻】則前切【集韻】【韻會】將先切，?音湔。【玉篇】表也。【後漢·黃香傳】所著賦牋奏書凡五篇。【廣韻】本作箋。

Note
Basic explanation of words
Note
jiān
Same as "Jan" ② Jian ④.
Note
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiān］
["Guangyun" cuts forward, flat first, and refined. ]
(1) One type of table text. After the Wei and Jin Dynasties, the above queens, princes and kings were often used.
(2) Refers to correspondence in general.
(3) Fine paper for writing.
Note
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Picture Word Department] 　 Jian; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 693 28
〔古文〕椾[Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] will cut forward [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] will cut first,? Yin 湔. [Jade articles] Table also. [Later Han·Huang Xiang Biography] Five chapters written by Fu Jian Zou Shu Fan. [Guang Yun] This is a commentary.
